definition: open to the view of all/spacious/to open wide/to disclose
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: It also had the ventral gondola under the nose, from which a gunner could fire rearwards .
sentences.chinese: 它還腹側敞車下鼻子，從其中一名炮手可大火在後面。

sentences.english: Kaput wooden salt carriers have also been preserved in the depot.
sentences.chinese: 殘破的運鹽用木質敞車羣亦在保存之列。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the coal transportation of the railway generally used the flatcar in China.
sentences.chinese: 我國現階段，煤在鐵路運輸中一般都採用敞車運輸。
